lines: 1. Kat` abed jaketh maduong`,Remb Yesu nochwer ni an;Nothona ni kik atho,To adag kode polo;Asiki but Jawarna,An ng`ate, to En Ruodha.
2. Hera Yesu duong` chutho,Onyiso polo malo,Tut moloyo nam matut,Osiko ma nyaka chieng`,Herane noywayoa,Nogola e mudho ka.
3. Kat` abed jaketh maduong`,Kristo oseng`wonona;Dwarona kod kuyona,Mago duto ong`eyo;Okonya e lwenje chuny,Ngimana okan kuome.
